rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a focus on natural light, incorporating Scandinavian design elements.
An expansive living area connected to the kitchen. The kitchen is designed for efficiency with luxury finishes and ample storage space, following Vastu principles for the kitchen's orientation.
A spacious master bedroom with a private balcony facing east, adhering to Vastu recommendations.
A comfortable guest bedroom with a balcony, oriented for natural light and peace.
Another guest bedroom with a balcony, designed for relaxation and privacy.
A luxurious bathroom on the first floor, equipped with modern amenities.
